Articles.Content:
Hello !

I've started a new and bigger Exploration Station able to drop a pod that would be able to come back to orbit and made a RDV from a planet like Duna (With Atmosphere).

But this second Station is a bit too complex and drop my fps as much to slow down the time in game :/

It forbid all controlled maneuvring.

So i think that a menu to hide some "Extra" parts like solar panels, science modules and links for example could push up my fps

This is my vessel : http://tof.canardpc.com/view/0c37158c-befb-45e9-81c9-ea7da9662bb1.jpg

Of course, i've lowered the graphics parameters to minimum, but nothing changed

I've a pretty good config, I5 3.20GHz, 8Go RAM, GC MSI GTX 570.

Thank you for your attention and continue to develop this great game!

Bye.

Kerbal Space Program doesn't run as slow due to it being graphicaly demmanding but becouse it uses physical engine which is only capable of using single core of your CPU.

In short this means more parts your ship have slower the game will run.
